# gux-date-time-beta



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                             | Type                                      | Default                    |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `datetime` | `datetime`  | The ISO string representation of the datetime to format | `string`                                  | `new Date().toISOString()` |
| `format`   | `format`    | Format option type                                      | `"full" \| "long" \| "medium" \| "short"` | `'short'`                  |
| `timeZone` | `time-zone` | Time zone identifier                                    | `string`                                  | `undefined`                |
